_notes.enabled: Set to true to enable filtering. When false, all slots are notified.
_notes.weather_zone.min_days_ahead: Skip slots sooner than this (0 = include today).
_notes.weather_zone.max_days_ahead: Apply weather filters up to this day (forecast reliable).
_notes.weather_zone.filters: Set any filter to null to disable it.
_notes.extended_zone.max_days_ahead: Skip slots beyond this day entirely.
_notes.extended_zone.allowed_days: Only these weekdays pass. Each needs from/to times.
